summary: Two Valkyrie Warriors at your disposal! One sister is the avatar of death, while the other is a strong, noble warrior. Marry one (or both!) and have them by your side always!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y485/Amorphis87/Sonja_Companion/CleanBanner_zpsaa41f399.jpg[/img]


[color=#CDBE70] Introduction [/color]

A fierce warrior whom resides in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. She is seeking glory and adventure - can you provide it for her?




[color=#CDBE70] Combat Stats & Follower Information [/color]

- +20% Attack with Two-Handed Greatswords.
- +20% To block.

- [x] Essential?
- [x] Protected? -[She will die if you attack her while she is in her defeated pose].
- [x] Marriable?
- [ ] Companion Sidequests? -[Not yet Implemented]
- [x] Configurable in UFO?

[color=#CDBE70] Installation [/color]
Use [color=#61B329]NMM[/color] to install. For manual install: copy data folder to skyrim directory.

[color=#CDBE70]Location [/color]
You can find her in Whiterun, in the Bannered Mare Inn.

[color=#CDBE70] General FAQ [/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: What body type is this compatible with?[/color]
[color=#1FA1F2]A: All. But what body/skin mods you have installed with determine the way Sonja looks.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: What mods are used in the Screenshots?[/color]
[color=#1FA1F2]A: Scroll down to the Recommended Mods section. It shows what mods directly affect her and what I have currently installed.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Do you plan to further expand this mod (Quest line, unique armour, etc)?[/color]
[color=#1FA1F2]A: Yes. But I am not familiar with the creation kit. It will take time.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: What mods are used in the Screenshots?[/color]
[color=#1FA1F2]A: Scroll down to the Recommended Mods section. It shows what mods directly affect her and what I have currently installed.[/color]

[color=#61B329]Q: Do you plan to add further customisation options? (eye-colour, hair styles/colour, etc?)[/color]
[color=#1FA1F2]A: Yes. But it depends on the original author. Don't ask for specific hairstyles. I will choose what I deem to be lore-friendly and what suits her personality-wise. If you want a specific hairstyle on her, you can always add it via creation kit.[/color]

[color=#CDBE70]Recommended Mods [:used in screenshots][/color]

Follower Overhauls/Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers by Volek[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere by Amgepo and Emma[/url]

Body/Hair/Face/Makeup/Skin Combinations:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- V3.2.3 by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45453]True Daughters of Skyrim by betterbecause[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113/]Better Females By Bella Natural Edition by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665]Better Makeup for SKSE by Diethardt[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29977]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt by Xenius[/url]

Other:

author: Amorphis87
